description: A JKR file contains save data for LocalThunk Balatro, a poker-themed roguelike deck-building game. It stores all of the game progress, settings, and configurations for a player profile, including the number of wins and acquired Joker stickers. JKR files allow users to save progress so they can close and resume gameplay and preserve their achievements.

instructions: JKR files are not meant to be opened. Instead, LocalThunk Balatro references the JKR files to load profile save data.
However, if you are looking to modify save data in a JKR file, you can upload it to Balatro Save Editor in a web browser.
